title: Strengthening AI Practical Skills: Language Education Through Reusable Learning Design Based on Recommendation Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform project-based language tasks by utilizing at least 80% of the learning design recommended by the system.
Learners can revise and reuse learning designs at least three times by incorporating peer feedback.
Learners can achieve a level 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) on the language proficiency assessment rubric in the final project.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
